Hydras:

Hydras hissed amused and said "I'm very surprised, old pal, that you speak 
of predacons in such way. You and Perceptor were... very close friends, or 
still you are? Besides, I tought that you would be very happy to have the 
chance to have your wife back in your life... Any way i wont discuss it"

Hydras pet one of his multiple heads while he did a ambigous smile when he 
recidved the encoded message and he typed one back highly encoded "Keep your 
eyes open and pick up all info that you can, dont do anything yet. Hide your 
intentions. if your have the chance set a track device in the little one"

-----Mensaje original----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Wednesday, August 10, 2011 3:06 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Strange meetings - the Silver Dragon and the Preds

> <OLD>
>
> There is a growl from Tucson, followed by a ground shaking roar.  He too 
> had
> suffered many injustices from the Predacons, yet he tries to put that 
> behind
> him as he sees the need to put the past behind him and move ahead.  The
> future depended on it.  In his draconic form he leaps in front of Rodimus,
> staring him in the eyes.
>
> "  No, it may look as if I am but in truth I am trying to make a point! 
> Yes
> we have both lost a great deal to our enemy but we will lose something.
> GREATER if we don't learn to. PUT THE PAST BEHIND US!  TIL ALL ARE ONE, 
> were
> the words of Primus. Till all are one.  Unicron is far beyond our factions
> alone but, if we work as one faction we have a chance to overpower this 
> new
> threat.  That is what I am trying to convey.  Leo Prime, that also applies
> to you, you may not understand my reasoning but in time you will."

<NEW>

RODIMUS PRIME just looked at TUSCON as if he has just lost his mind,
his optics still smoldering with his own inner emotions. "You started
this mission in an effort to wipe out the evil." He said in clipped
tones. "And yet here we are trying to work with them to destroy a
greater evil."

He turned to look at TUSCON, optic to optic. "And what do you think
they will do should they gain the upper hand, or when this is over?"

Folded his arms across his chest he just looked at TUSCON. "Now is not
the time for discussions like this. But if you think I will work with
Cyclonus or any other Predacon without my hand on my weapon and my
guard up, then you don't know me."

"I will finish this mission as is needed." RODIMUS PRIME said as he
stepped around TUSCON to continue towards the Dinosaurs. "Then me and
you are going to talk."

(TAG)

Preston
